First set up a github account here if you don’t have one. Then, go to http://127.0.0.1:8086

Once logged in you’ll be presented with the main sdk screen:

[overview of datastores, processors and outputs]

Let’s load up an example app:

Click on the databox.tutorial-monitor-chart. You should now see a new flow in the workspace:

Lets look at the osmonitor datasource (the yellow node)

Now lets look at the chart node

Up top there is a risk overview for this app:

Now lets test it:

…in the debugger

..and lets test the chart viz:

Ok, all looks good, lets publish:

And this may take a while as the container is built, pushed to github etc.

Once done, you should see your new app:

And now go to your github account and you should see it there too.
